name: Sub-Space Boulder: Rocky Bulwark
description: One of the rocks that form part of the basic terrain of adepti abodes. Walls made using this sturdy stone can repel monster attacks with ease.\nOf course, adepti abodes are places of peace where no monsters would enter.\n"You can try Madame Ping's teapot if you don't believe me," Tubby insists with perfect seriousness.
